entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8602 false positive after TryGetValue #73274
  • [BUG] "Move Type To .." feature not generating new .cs file #73273
    17.11 P3
  • Error when applying IDE0079 in problems tab #73272
    17.11 P3
  • Collection expression span optimization should reuse temps when possible #73269
  • RelationalOperatorType: Invalid OperatorType for Char #73267
  • Using IDisposable will dispose before Task Continuation is completed. #73264
  • Debug assertion failure in GuardedAddBoundTreeForStandaloneSyntax #73262
    17.11
  • IDE0200 (remove unnecessary lambda expression) can change semantics when capturing writable members #73259
    Backlog
  • C# Format Problem: Insert space before comma #73258
    Backlog
  • Unhelpful/annoying intellisense suggestion when calling method with params if the argument is an expression/func #73257
  • Type inference for lambdas in collection expressions #73256

Closed

  • AbstractFileHeaderDiagnosticAnalyzer uses `CustomSeverityConfigurable` but does not provide a way to set the custom severity #72876
    17.10
  • Remove unnecessary imports analyzer is significantly slowing builds (11% CPU time) #72162
  • Tracking issue for any pull diagnostics coordinated insert work. #72428
    17.10 P2
  • CS1503 cannot convert from 'object' to #73098

PullRequests

Created

  • Update configs for 17.11 branch #73271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Nullable annotate InMethodyBinder #73270
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • On The Fly Documentation #73268
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move test reference assemblies forward #73266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73265
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid setting `hasAnyCodeStyleOption` for analyzers with no `CodeStyleOption2<T>` #73263
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P1
  • Restore parallel processing options for Find-References. #73255
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P1
  • Allow use of more Hot Reload brokered services by LSP (for VS Code) #73240
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, 17.11 P1

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73275
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Fix IOperation of byref member initializer #73243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #73208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test if code is needed #73163
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Fix need for redundant enter when rename suggestions are not available #73247
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle labels in outer scope in control flow pass #73234
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Update Semantic Search to work when ServiceHub is disabled #73196
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
